title: Local Hour: Top 5 Scary Sports Moments
description:
The Miami Heat have gotten off to a rough start, Chris Cote's Sunday Night Football behavior exemplifies the Miami sports fan, and a look back at Stugotz's Bryce Harper comments. Then, Stu's Top 5 Moments Where Stugotz Has Been Most Scared Watching Sports. Plus, QB's on the run and the Chiefs thriving despite losing one of the game's best wide receivers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
